protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. Additionally, GC RMA normalisation was carried out using Partek Genomics Suite. ID_REF =  VALUE = GC RMA signal intensities

Analyses were carried out using 400 ng total RNA isolated in biological triplicate from Col:LUC seedlings grown on B5 media for 10 days and transferred to fresh plates, containing either B5 media or B5 media supplemented with 4.5 uM NAA for an additional 3 days.Seedlings were treated with 50 uM AA for 3 hours.

40 mg of Col-0 and Attim17-1 Arabidopsis thaliana seeds were surface steralized and plated on B5 media. Stratification was carried out at 4 degreesC in darkness, followed by long day growth conditions at 100 uE m -2 sec-1 at 22 degreesC.
RNA isolation was carried out using the Sigma-Aldrich Spectrumâ„¢ Plant Total RNA Kit.
Biotinylated aRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 400 ng total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

Following fragmentation, 12.5 ug of the labelled aRNA was hybridised rotating at 60 rpm, 16 hr at 45 degreesC on GeneChip ATH1 arrays. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned individually using a GeneChip Scanner 3000
